text: Steffi Lemke (born 19 January 1968) is a German politician of Alliance 90/The Greens who has the Federal Minister for the Environment, Nature Conservation, Nuclear Safety, and Consumer Protection since 2021. Lemke has been a member of the Bundestag from the state of Saxony-Anhalt from 1994 through 2002 and since 2013. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Environment ministers of Germany Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians of Alliance '90/The Greens Category:Politicians from Saxony-Anhalt
title: Steffi Lemke
